```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, descr) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"
    tbl[[where]] <- gsub("\n", " \\\\newline ", tbl[[where]])
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[descr]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}

cvproj <- function(tbl,what,role,items){
    command_start <- "\\cvproj"
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[role]], "}",
        "{", sapply(tbl[[items]], function(x)paste0(x,collapse = ", ")), "}"
    )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}
```

# Summary

Data Scientist with 9 years of experience in the analysis of all sorts of data. I have a strong background in hierarchical modeling and I am an expert in R. I am passionate about Open Science and I am experienced in building and maintaining open source projects. I am a team player and I have experience in leading and coordinating projects.
